bacci.giovanni.biogiova.multialignment.scoring

Class ScoringFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacci.giovanni.biogiova.multialignment.scoring.ScoringFunction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinimumEntropyScoringFunction, SumOfPairScoringFunction

    public abstract class ScoringFunction
extends Object
    Abstract class representing a Scoring Function.
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        public abstract double getScore(char[] bases)
        Each implementation of this class has to implement this function.
        Parameters:
        bases - the bases from which calculate the score in a character array form
        Returns:
        the score attributed to all the bases

      • refineScore

        public abstract double refineScore(double score)
        Abstract method. Each implementation of this class has to implement this function. This function is called every time a score is calculated by an Aligner.
        Parameters:
        score - the score calculated
        Returns:
        a refined score value

      • getType

        public AlignmentType getType()
        This method return the AlignmentType of this ScoringFunction
        Returns:
        the alignment type
